backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, networks, transmissions, and authorization with persistent state and access‑controlled queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI background and layout requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of all major frontend React components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light/dark theme tokens and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up root div and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes, auth gating, and profile initialization flow.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout with header, footer, navigation, and consistent dark background wrapper.
Component rendering a segmented audio input level meter driven by audio metering hook.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Guard component blocking access to protected routes and prompting login when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/ColorAccentPanel: Neutral dark‑theme panel wrapper providing subtle bordered container without bright accents.
Renders a themed page header with optional icon, title, and subtitle. Provides a neutral styled container used across various page variants.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryBrowser: Displays a searchable, filterable list of digital networks and their talkgroups with favorite toggling. Handles network and talkgroup selection logic.
frontend/src/components/IaxDvswitchConne: Form for configuring and saving IAX/DVSwitch gateway connection settings. Validates input and redirects to the PTT page after saving.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling. Clears cached data on logout and retries if the user is already authenticated.
frontend/src/components/NowHearingList.t: Shows a live list of recent transmissions with metadata and timestamps. Handles loading, empty state, and active transmission display.
frontend/src/components/PersonalDirector: Manages user-defined directory entries stored in localStorage, with add and delete functionality. Renders entry cards and an input form for new entries.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog for initial user profile setup requiring callsign and license acknowledgement. Saves the profile and handles validation and errors.
frontend/src/components/PttControl.tsx: Push-to-talk button managing press/hold interactions and transmit state. Calls start/stop callbacks and updates visual feedback accordingly.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeStatusBa: Displays connection, transmit, and receive status badges along with the room label.
frontend/src/components/TransmitDisclaim: Shows a warning alert requiring users to acknowledge a valid amateur radio license before using voice features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioLevelMeter.ts: Tracks microphone audio levels in real time using Web Audio API and reports activity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile through backend actor queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Loads and toggles a user's favorite networks via backend actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicPttRecorder.ts: Handles push‑to‑talk audio recording using MediaRecorder and returns the recorded audio URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworks.ts: Retrieves builtin networks and performs client‑side search filtering via backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNowHearing.ts: Fetches real‑time 'now hearing' transmissions with polling and allows manual updates.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferredConnectio: Stores, loads, and manages preferred connection settings with backward compatibility support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrzLookup.ts: Performs QRZ callsign lookup via backend actor if supported.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Fetches the caller's user role and admin status from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebRtcPtt.ts: Implements a WebRTC push‑to‑talk hook managing peer connection setup, media streams, signaling, and transmission state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a dark radio‑themed OKLCH color palette with custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutCompliancePage.t: Renders an about/compliance page explaining PTTStar features and licensing requirements using styled panels.
frontend/src/pages/ActivityPage.tsx: Displays real‑time transmission activity with auto‑updating ‘Now Hearing’ data and manual refresh.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Provides UI to configure or clear IAX/DVSwitch connection settings with tabbed connect/disconnect views.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Offers browsing of networks and management of personal directory entries via tabbed interface.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Shows the marketing landing page with authentication entry point and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/PttPage.tsx: Push-to-talk page that loads the preferred connection, joins a WebRTC room, manages TX/RX state, handles mic permissions, and renders UI for transmitting audio.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page that loads and edits the user profile, performs QRZ callsign lookups, and saves license acknowledgement and profile fields.
frontend/src/utils/roomKey.ts: Utility to derive a deterministic WebRTC room key and human-readable label from IAX/DVSwitch or directory connection data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app purpose, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
